item.title: iPhone Air MagSafe Battery Can Charge AirPods, Apple Watch, and More
item.description: While the iPhone Air MagSafe Battery is not compatible with any other iPhone models, the USB-C port on the battery pack can charge some smaller accessories. As noted by 9to5Mac’s Zac Hall, the iPhone
